caption.title: Models trained on distribution records in Europe and North America combined
caption.p: Habitat suitability of common ragweed ( A. artemisiifolia) (Aâ€“C) , perennial ragweed ( A. psilostachya) (D-F) and giant ragweed ( A. trifida) (G-I) in Europe under current climate conditions, and future climates (projections for years 2070-2099) assuming RCP 6.0 and RCP 8.5. Maps show average MAXENT values, derived from 15 replicates.
